Information: An AWS Lambda capable of creating an S3 object with a Date/Time stamp of when it was created within its content
All the command line options for the Lambda command can be specified in this file.
LB_BUCKET=       [Specifies the name of the bucket to place the stamped object(s)]
LB_DATEFORMAT=   [Specifies the .Net Date/Time Format String to use when creating the contents of the stamped object(s)]
